ygData.subject: Planning for the future.....
ygData.msgSnippet: ... She looked at Drillbit. Phobia is dead. I can not do into detail now. But you are under me again untill we can hold a meeting with the others. OK?

::KitKat::

She looked at Drillbit. "Phobia is dead. I can not do into detail 
now. But you are under me again untill we can hold a meeting with the 
others. OK?"  Normally she wouldn't ask his opinion or permission. As 
a leader, she didn't need to. But, she was ingaged to him, so part of 
her spark wanted his approval.  She knew if things got that bad, she 
would hve to pick the team over her love. No matter how hard that 
would be.  But in her situation, the good of the many out wayed the 
good of the one. But somewhere in her spark, she felt that the group 
would make the same dicision if places were reveresed.
